Product.Name: Space-dyed cardigan
Product.Description: Our designers used a unique space-dyeing technique to give this soft-as-can-be cardigan a richly textured, almost heathered look. Cotton. V-neck. Long sleeves. Patch pockets. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Swing sweater
Product.Description: Lightweight yet cozy, simple yet stylish we designed this textural swing style to be completely irresistible. The thick 3-gauge knit is marled to give a multidimensional effect, while the slouchy shape, oversize sleeves and chunky trim make it an easy-to-wear piece with plenty of personality. Cotton/alpaca/merino wool/nylon. Loose fit. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Jaspé pullover
Product.Description: We used a twisted cotton yarn and a special knitting technique to achieve this highly sought-after vintage heathered effect for this all-season pullover. A lighter-weight layer to love over your favorite button-down for cool-girl warmth or to sport solo when warmer weather hits. Cotton jaspé. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Jackie pullover
Product.Description: Our own style icon, now in a streamlined popover silhouette. We gave it a high-tech twist with the addition of high-power Lycra® in order to transform the classic cotton sweater into this soft yet structured piece. Available in a rainbow of happy hues, it's perfect alone or paired with the original for a new take on the twinset. Cotton/nylon/spandex in a 14-gauge knit. Crewneck. Bracelet sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Ripplestitch cardigan
Product.Description: One to wear all season long, featuring a chunky stitch with long sleeves. Finished with retro-inspired patch pockets for a touch of panache. Cotton. V-neck. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Colorblock cardigan
Product.Description: This cozy, contrast-trim cardigan comes in a substantial knit with a foldover shawl collar and trim along the pockets, hem and cuffs. With its Grandpa's closet inspiration, this oversize button-down can be worn atop a feminine dress or with a slim pant for a vintage vibe. Acrylic/wool/mohair in a 5-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Welt pockets. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wynter V-neck sweater
Product.Description: Soft and sporty, this flattering V-neck is styled with a slim body and fitted sleeves to give it that long and lean look. Pearlized buttons along the shoulders add a bit of retro prettiness, while bold hues make it uniquely cool. A hint of mohair practically guarantees it will warm up any wish list. Acrylic/nylon/wool/mohair in a 5-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Ripplestitch sweater in stripe
Product.Description: Like daughter, like mother: Due to popular demand, we took one of our most popular crewcuts sweaters and updated it just for you. Featuring a chunky stitch with three-quarter sleeves and a slightly cropped body, it's finished with a chic bateau neckline and nautical-inspired stripes. Cotton. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Garment-dyed burnout crepe sweater
Product.Description: A sweater version of our superwearable burnout tees, this slightly slouchy sheer sweater is made of Italian crepe garment-dyed to achieve its brilliant color that goes from thick to thin in an off-kilter stripe. Italian polyamide/viscose/angora in a 7-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere cable boatneck sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. We're particularly smitten with this top's chic boatneck and slightly cropped sleeves. In a 5-gauge knit. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere candy-stripe sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. With a boxy body, slim sleeves and bold stripes, it's an effortless way to make a luxurious statement. In a 12-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Dream V-neck sweater in stripe
Product.Description: This classic slouchy pullover comes in our comfy dream yarn. It's styled with a flattering V-neck and comes in cool-hue chunky stripes. An easy way to brighten up your fall wardrobe. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 7-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Dream Fair Isle crewneck sweater
Product.Description: In past seasons, we borrowed from the boys, and now we're taking cues from Grandpa's closet with vintage-inspired Fair Isle patterns. With raglan sleeves and an allover custom-designed print, this fine-knit crewneck has an easygoing, slightly boxy shape you'll love to layer. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cotton waffle pullover
Product.Description: A giant waffle stitch gives the body of this baseball tee-style pullover textural interest while jersey sleeves keep the fit lean and flattering. Our designers call the technique texture blocking we just call it genius. Cotton. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Funnelneck pullover
Product.Description: We dressed up a classic drawstring sweatshirt with an exaggerated turtleneck for a touch of extra warmth on chilly days. Crafted in a heathered terry that's supersoft on the inside, with a subtle texture and an addictively slouchy drape outside. Cotton. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Paneled cashmere sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. You'll want to wear this swingy sweater with just about everything. Subtly exposed seaming and a banded hem and cuffs render our four-season cashmere both sporty and luxe. With a flattering square neckline to showcase your best features. Italian cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cable-stitch sweater
Product.Description: We've updated our cable fisherman-style sweater with a new yarn for a perfect layering piece that's ultrasoft and undeniably chic. Acrylic/wool/mohair in a 5-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Double-stripe sweater
Product.Description: Our cotton sweaters are a perennial favorite for their easy-to-wear style, and now we've kicked it up a notch with a unique double stripe. The silhouette is slightly boxy in the body with slim sleeves, making it easy to layer under a blazer or coat indispensable. V-neck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cotton V-neck sweater
Product.Description: An absolute classic, this year-round wardrobe essential is so easy to wear, it's hard to choose just one of its color-happy, mood-lifting hues. Cotton. V-neck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Authier® cashmere ski sweater
Product.Description: Originally founded in Switzerland in 1910, this Italian brand of "chic sportif" is synonymous with elegance and innovation. Its ready-to-wear collection launched in 1990 and inspired by the sport's golden age transfers the charm, craftsmanship and technology of its skis to clothing, coveted by ski enthusiasts and fashion aficionados alike. Densely knit from 100 percent cashmere and an extra-long drawstring funnelneck are sure to keep even the nastiest elements at bay. Whether you're an ace at moguls or just a lodge lover at heart, this luxe pullover is the one to wear all season long. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Made in Italy.

Product.Name: Dream stripe tee sweater
Product.Description: Our two favorite things cool-hue stripes and the oh so comfy pocket tee get paired to perfection in our beyond-soft dream yarn. A top to pop on for a touch of whimsy with jeans or a sleek pencil skirt. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Crewneck. Short sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere funnelneck sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. A design team must-have, this cashmere pullover sports a chunky ribbed body offset by skinny jersey-knit sleeves for a chic monochromatic layered look. Italian cashmere in a 3-gauge knit. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Jumpseat cardigan
Product.Description: A rich merino layer to smarten up all your looks. With double-breasted shank buttons up the front, a strap detail at the cuffs and roomy front pockets, it's a fabulous third piece for chilly autumn days. Merino wool in a 7-gauge knit. Standing collar. Long sleeves. Welt pockets. Hits above knee. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere on-the-button henley
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. Ready for anything, this luxe popover is a seasonless way to layer up. It's updated with raglan sleeves and exaggerated ribbing along the hem, cuffs and collar, and the 12-gauge knit is punctuated with made-to-match oversize enamel buttons. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wynter cowlneck sweater
Product.Description: With its oversize cowlneck that's both slouchy andsophisticated our favorite combo this universally flattering sweater is as pretty as it is crowd-pleasing. We can't help but cozy up to its body-skimming silhouette and fitted sleeves in a clutch of wear-with-all shades. A hint of mohair practically guarantees it will warm up any wish list. Acrylic/nylon/wool/mohair in a 5-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Burnout crepe sweater
Product.Description: A sweater version of our superwearable burnout tees, this slightly slouchy, sheer sweater is made of Italian crepe that goes from thick to thin in an off-kilter stripe. Italian polyamide/viscose/angora in a 7-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wynter V-neck sweater in stripe
Product.Description: Soft and sporty, this flattering V-neck is styled with a slim body and fitted sleeves to give it that long and lean look. Pearlized buttons along the shoulders add a bit of retro prettiness, while bold hues make it uniquely cool. A hint of mohair practically guarantees it will warm up any wish list.Acrylic/nylon/wool/mohair in a 5-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Donegal wool shawl cardigan
Product.Description: The tweedy effect of this classic cardigan comes from the genuine Donegal yarn, which gives it a slight textural statement that looks great layered over just about anything. The foldover collar, big buttons and body-skimming fit put a modern spin on a traditional way to stay warm. Wool/angora/nylon/silk in a 5-gauge knit. Loose fit. Long sleeves. Hits above knee. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Cashmere pocket poncho
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. A design team pick, this luxurious poncho sweater is crafted in a substantial 7-gauge knit for a supersoft feel that's slightly structured too. Chicly oversize and a touch sporty this one works perfectly with skinny jeans. Boatneck. Short sleeves. Hits at hip. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Mohair cardigan in leopard
Product.Description: Our ladylike cropped cardi gets a little wild, and we couldn't be more thrilled with the results. Ideal over an LBD or with a classic jean, it's styled in an ombré animal print with a flattering deep-V neckline. Light, airy and effortlessly glamorous. Mohair/nylon/wool in a 7-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Cashmere cascade sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. With its plunging shawl collar and curve-skimming fit, this irresistibly soft style takes its cue from the bombshells of yore. Face framing, accessory friendly and ultra-flattering, this is a holiday party sweater if ever we saw one. In a 12-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Wynter sweater in sequin stripe
Product.Description: Bold rugby stripes get doused in a twinkly mix of big and small sequins for that sporty-sparkly mix that's a near obsession with our designers. Trimmed at the neck and cuffs in cozy rib, the hint of mohair only adds to its lofty feel. Perfectly polished at the office or the office party it's that day-to-night piece to shine in all season long. Acrylic/nylon/wool/mohair in a 5-gauge knit. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino tatting lace sweater
Product.Description: The delicate front of this merino wool sweater was created in-house by our design team, which is in the midst of a major moment when it comes to feminine lace. Thanks to a superfine 14-gauge knit and a slightly slouchy silhouette, this sweater feels just as good as it looks. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Winter floral cardigan
Product.Description: Simplicity never goes out of style, so we remade our classic cardigan au courant in this sophisticated winter floral. The fine 14-gauge knit spun from supersoft merino wool makes it a natural with just about anything. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Stripe popover sweatshirt
Product.Description: Stripes are everywhere this year, including on our much-loved popovers. With its soft knit and open neckline, this top is four-season standby that we can't do without. Cotton/poly fleece. Open crewneck. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Shimmer bow sweater
Product.Description: This party-ready pullover makes it easy to shine on the holiday soiree circuit. Lightweight and super-feminine, it's styled with a flattering scoopneck and a keyhole back that ties with a silky ribbon. Alpaca/poly in a 12-gauge knit. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Sequin shawl-collar cardigan
Product.Description: We adore sequins for their uncanny ability to take any piece from basic totrés belle. Featuring wear-with-all sparkle, this shawl-collar sweater is one of the season's standout layers. Merino wool in a 14-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Welt pockets. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Handknit fisherman cable-knit cardigan
Product.Description: We love this gorgeous handknit wool cardigan's intricate cable-knit weave that our designers created just for this season. Even better, it gets a touch of shine from brass buttons emblazoned with regal crests and feminine appeal from the boxy, cropped shape. Old-school, classic, rustic we just can't say enough good things about it. You'll have fun finding new ways to wear it: Over pretty dresses, atop classic jeans and with workwear are all fair game. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Cashmere epaulet sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. A design team pick, this super-luxe pullover is styled with sporty shoulder panels and inside-out seaming along the crewneck. In a 3-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Jester turtleneck sweater
Product.Description: Not too slim, not too slouchy, this classic-fit turtleneck boasts a front panel of bold but neutral argyle that's just-right retro. When paired with a sleek pencil skirt or a slim trouser, the effect is thoroughly modern. Merino wool in a 14-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Dream crewneck sweater
Product.Description: It's all about a boxy body and skinny sleeves this season and this perfect pullover brings it in a big way in a supersoft mix of wool and cashmere. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 7-gauge knit. Loose fit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere cable cowlneck sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. This top combines the season's understated-meets-polished silhouette the cowlneck with can't-miss cables. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Blackmoor Fair Isle sweater
Product.Description: Inspired by time-honored Scottish style, our interpretation of the traditional Fair Isle is a modern twist on a classic in a darkly dramatic palette. A truly special sweater, it's accented with contrast stitching on the sleeves and body every single stitch is done completely by hand. Acrylic/alpaca/merino wool in a 7-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Turtleneck sweater
Product.Description: The timeless turtleneck, updated in completely crush-worthy colors. Featuring a slim fit, feminine three-quarter sleeves and a slightly shorter length, it's the perfect complement to the season's high-waisted looks. Cotton/wool in a 14-gauge knit. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Sequin Isabel sweatshirt
Product.Description: We've perfected the sweatshirt by spinning your slouchy favorite in supersoft Italian merino wool with a slightly oversize silhouette. Finished with hundreds of hand-applied sequins, it's a glam take on the sporty classic. In a 14-gauge knit. Open crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Chainlink cable sweater in stripe
Product.Description: A rustic classic gets a chic new twist with exquisitely textured cables. Crafted of merino wool in a cozy 3-gauge knit, with slim three-quarter sleeves that balance out the slightly swingy silhouette for a look that's as rough-and-tumble as it is sweet. Crewneck. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Fisherman sweater
Product.Description: Inspired by traditional Aran knit sweaters, our designers reimagined the classic in a supersoft mix of alpaca and wool. With intricate allover cables in a mixed stitch and a slightly shorter silhouette, it's the ultimate blend of substance and style in a wear-forever piece. Acrylic/alpaca/merino wool in a 3-gauge knit. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Crystal button cardigan
Product.Description: We updated our classic cardigan with specially designed buttons in muted gold with tiny crystals at their centers. A universally flattering silhouette and a rainbow of happy hues make it a fabulous gift for anyone whose favorite color you happen to know. Acrylic/alpaca/merino wool in a 7-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Welt pockets. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Marled henley popover
Product.Description: It's all about a boxy body and skinny sleeves this season and this perfect pullover henley brings it in a big way in a chunky marled knit. Styled with a foldover ribbed collar that you can button up high or leave open, depending on which way the wind blows. Wool/poly/alpaca/nylon. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Kendor cardigan
Product.Description: Named after a charming and authentically rustic cabin that sits on the shores of Lake Pocono, this cardigan is one of our all-time favorites. A refined take on our beloved yoga cardigan we made it chicer than ever with thick rib trim along the front edges and pockets. The fit is fabulously slouchy and flattering an easy piece to throw on over just about anything. Acrylic/superfine alpaca/wool in a 5-gauge knit. Loose fit. Shawl collar. Long sleeves. Welt pockets. Hits above knee. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Colorblock minimalist mockneck sweater
Product.Description: Sophisticated, sleek and nearly seamless, this minimalist merino mockneck is a chic canvas upon which to build your look. Pair with a pencil skirt or a skinny trouser to make a timeless style statement. Merino wool in a 7-gauge knit. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Chainlink cable sweater
Product.Description: A rustic classic gets a chic new twist with exquisitely textured cables. Crafted of merino wool in a cozy 3-gauge knit, with slim three-quarter sleeves that balance out the slightly swingy silhouette for a look that's as rough-and-tumble as it is sweet. Crewneck. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino turtleneck sweater
Product.Description: A wardrobe must-have in the most crush-worthy colors of the season. Merino wool in a 14-gauge knit. Turtleneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Dream half-zip sweater
Product.Description: This classic zip-collar pullover is spun from our beyond-soft dream yarn. In can't-miss neutral shades and a slightly boxy silhouette, it's a perfect layering piece that will go great with just about everything else in your closet. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 7-gauge knit. Shawl collar. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere rugby-stripe turtleneck sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. A design favorite, this bold rugby-stripe sweater sports a slightly oversize shape with slim sleeves for a perfect fit underneath blazers, jackets and coats. Crafted in a 12-gauge knit, it's a luxe layering piece for crisp, cool weather. Turtleneck. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere short-sleeve V-neck sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. One of Jenna's must-have pieces for fall, this super-luxurious chunky cashmere sweater has a slightly longer silhouette that's perfect layered over ladylike dresses. In a 7-gauge knit. V-neck. Short sleeves. Hits below hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Always wrap cardigan
Product.Description: Open and elegant, our much-loved always cardigan is made of a special cotton blend that gives it an exquisite drape and a silky feel. Now updated with ties at each side for a sophisticated wrap fit, while perfectly placed pockets keep all your essentials close. Cotton/rayon. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Honeycomb cable sweater
Product.Description: Our custom-designed cable-knit weave is made even sweeter with a touch of supersoft angora. This shrunken sweater is destined to become your go-to with jeans, under a blazer or with a pencil skirt. Viscose/nylon/wool/angora in a 5-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino Cambon cardigan
Product.Description: Is it a cardigan or a layer-worthy jacket? We say it's both and then some. This lightweight piece is trimmed with bold colorblocking along the neckline, front pockets and hidden button placket for an instantly polished look. Dressed up or down, for work or the weekend, this is a ladylike statement in fine-knit merino wool. In a 14-gauge knit. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Welt pockets. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Authier® arm band sweater
Product.Description: Originally founded in Switzerland in 1910, this Italian brand of "chic sportif" is synonymous with elegance and innovation. Its ready-to-wear collection launched in 1990 and inspired by the sport's golden age transfers the charm, craftsmanship and technology of its skis to clothing, coveted by ski enthusiasts and fashion aficionados alike. Turtleneck. Long sleeves. Made in Italy.

Product.Name: Fair Isle sweater
Product.Description: Bands of handknit stitching detail the hem of this understated update to the classic Fair Isle sweater. Crafted in cozy wool with a touch of alpaca for supreme softness, it's a sweater you'll wear and love for years to come. Acrylic/alpaca/merino wool in a 7-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Snowbound sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. We're obsessed with retro ski lodge sweaters this season, and this low-key nod to the trend features a thick-rib crewneck collar, vertical seaming along the yoke and cute dot buttons at each shoulder. Italian cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Slouchy dolman-sleeve sweatshirt
Product.Description: A current obsession? Chic dolman sleeves. We're crazy about the way they add a stylish twist to this traditional wear-with-anything topper. Cotton. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cashmere bateau sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. Our salute to the nautical classic, thistrés bellebateau features all the traditional details you can't resist. In a 5-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Jenna's V-neck cardigan
Product.Description: Our creative director, Jenna, asked the design team to come up with the perfectly cropped cardigan to wear specifically with a dress, and voilà. Short but not too short, with a higher ribbed hem and a V-neckline, it is, indeed, absolutely perfect. Merino wool in a 14-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits above hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere ribbed sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. Inspired by the classic sweatshirt, we reimagined the slouchy favorite in a chunkier knit but kept all the traditional details. In a 5-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Minimalist mockneck sweater
Product.Description: Sophisticated, sleek and nearly seamless, this minimalist merino mockneck is a chic canvas upon which to build your look. Pair with a pencil skirt or a skinny trouser to make a timeless style statement. Merino wool in a 7-gauge knit. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Seamore sweater
Product.Description: An update to our popular sailor sweater, now in lightweight cotton and wool in a splash of fresh new colors for the season. Like the original, it features our new design-darling silhouette: a looser body, skinnier arms and drop shoulders with convertible bracelet sleeves. In a 14-gauge knit. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Dream dolman sweater
Product.Description: One of those slouchy, low-key sweaters you'll want to wear again and again. With textured ribbing running horizontally from cuff to cuff, it has slight dolman sleeves and an open crewneck that helps it hang loosely for a laid-back yet utterly chic look we love. Spun from our beyond-soft dream yarn. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 7-gauge knit. Loose fit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Betsy sweater
Product.Description: A new spin on cashmere our designers added a special mercerized lambswool, known for its incredible softness and the way it beautifully absorbs color, to create this wear-with-all wardrobe must-have. In nine crush-worthy hues, this is one you'll reach for again and again. Mercerized wool/cashmere in a 7-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Cashmere shawl-collar cardigan
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. A slouchy cut makes this cozy cardigan the perfect pick for everything from running to the store to running your business. In a 12-gauge knit. Loose fit. Shawl collar. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Button box sweater
Product.Description: Our classic crewneck gets updated in a subtle yet sophisticated mixed stitch that plays on its fresh, boxy shape and elbow sleeves. Buttons at the shoulders and rib stitching add fine finishing touches. Acrylic/alpaca/merino wool in a 7-gauge knit. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Merino funnelneck cardigan
Product.Description: Detailed with fine ribbing and finished with a fabulously chic funnelneck. Crafted in a chunkier knit merino wool, it's the perfect third piece to wear in place of a jacket. In a 5-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Slit pockets. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Bateau button sweater
Product.Description: A classic silhouette in our seasonless cotton-wool blend. Topped off with buttons at its effortlessly elegant boatneck, this staple never goes out of style for a reason. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Dream cardigan
Product.Description: A wear-with-all cardigan crafted in our beyond-soft dream yarn. The only problem with this piece is deciding which color. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. V-neck. Long sleeves. Welt pockets. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Jenna's cardigan in nightfall floral
Product.Description: Our creative director, Jenna, asked the design team to come up with the perfectly cropped cardigan to wear specifically with a dress, and voilà. Short but not too short, with a higher ribbed hem, it is, indeed, absolutely perfect. Now in a striking winter floral our designers picked especially for this season. Merino wool in a 14-gauge knit. V-neck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits above hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Authier® pullover parka
Product.Description: Originally founded in Switzerland in 1910, this Italian brand of "chic sportif" is synonymous with elegance and innovation. Its ready-to-wear collection launched in 1990 and inspired by the sport's golden age transfers the charm, craftsmanship and technology of its skis to clothing coveted by ski enthusiasts and fashion aficionados alike. Streetwear inspired and unfailingly slope ready, we love this popover's tomboy-chic detailing from its camo-motif lining to the oversize, Swiss-made silver zippers. Water resistant with PrimaLoft® insulation this will keep you superwarm in cutting-edge style from Aspen to the Alps. Hood. Half-zip closure. Long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket. Part of J.Crew Collection. Made in Italy. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere shawl-collar sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. In a 12-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere cable sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. In a 7-gauge knit. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Oversize Fair Isle cardigan
Product.Description: Handknit with special Italian yarn, this snap-front sweater is styled with an oversize graphic Fair Isle pattern. Supertextural with wide rib-knit details, textured stitch seaming and fitted sleeves, it has that rustic overtone that we love in a big sweater. Acrylic/wool/mohair. V-neck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Mohair magnitude cardigan
Product.Description: We're having a mohair moment. We fell in love all over again with this supersoft yarn for its silk-like texture and shimmery lustre it's soft, effortless and unfailingly feminine. Perfectly tailored in a trim, fitted silhouette and a slightly longer length, we're certain this little cardigan is going to be big. Mohair/nylon/wool in a 7-gauge knit. V-neck. Long sleeves. Hits below hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere shoulder-button sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. Glossy buttons line the shoulders of this updated maritime classic. In a 12-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Dream crewneck sweater
Product.Description: So soft, it practically named itself. Crafted in our beyond-soft dream yarn, it's the wear-with-everything piece everyone needs in their closet. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Dream open cardigan
Product.Description: This sublimely cozy, goes-with-everything layering piece has an open front and is made in our beyond-soft dream yarn. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 7-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits below hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere boyfriend cardigan
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. You'll never want to borrow his again. In a 12-gauge knit. V-neck. Long sleeves. Welt pockets. Hits below hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Fisherman's henley
Product.Description: We took the classic cable fisherman's sweater and updated it with a henley-style placket and enamel crest buttons to turn it into a favorite you'll wear all season long. Cotton. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Sparkle seamore sweater
Product.Description: An update to our popular sailor sweater, now in lightweight cotton and wool with a touch of Lurex® for a shot of shimmer. Like the original, it features our new design-darling silhouette: a looser body, skinnier arms and drop shoulders with convertible bracelet sleeves. In a 14-gauge knit. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cashmere rugby-stripe V-neck sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. Traditional rugby stripes make this V-neck a definite score. In a 12-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Porcupine popover
Product.Description: Featuring a chiffon overlay embroidered with fabulous allover jeweled fringe, our soft merino wool popover adds a touch of textural interest to any ensemble. In a 14-gauge knit. Crewneck. Short sleeves. Hits at hip. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Sidenote sweater
Product.Description: A chameleon of a sweater that can be worn different ways: open, the cascades of merino wool create loose, beautifully soft lines; closed, the asymmetrical zipper creates instant polish with an elevated edge. Fashioned from merino with a touch of alpaca for softness. Acrylic/alpaca/merino wool in a 5-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Italian camel cable sweater
Product.Description: A wear-forever favorite: This beautiful cable-knit sweater was hand knit for us in luxurious Italian merino and supersoft camel hair. The incredibly intricate design requires many hours to complete but some things are worth it. Italian merino wool/camel hair/poly. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino boyfriend sweatshirt
Product.Description: A chicly oversize silhouette that drapes in soft cascades, creating a lovely layer that dresses up or down. Crafted in refined merino wool and finished with a drop shoulder for a luxe take on the boyfriend-inspired basic. In a 14-gauge knit. Open crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere summer fling sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. Our designers' favorite new sweater silhouette is wider and boxier, with looser sleeves that recall the elegance of a kimono. The result? An amazing drape and a plush feel that personifies casual chic. In a 14-gauge knit. V-neck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino Fair Isle sweater
Product.Description: Inspired by time-honored Scottish style, our interpretation of the traditional Fair Isle is a modern twist on a classic. In dramatically dark tones, it's a sophisticated layering piece that adds rustic polish over a button-down or under a blazer. Merino wool in a 14-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Microstripe cardigan
Product.Description: Microstripes add a fine graphic impact to our classic cardigan. Fashioned from a cotton and wool knit and finished with a flattering hip-length silhouette. In a 14-gauge knit. V-neck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Long shore sweater
Product.Description: In line with our favorite fall fashions, our allover ribbed sweater is classically chic with a boyfriend-inspired silhouette. Crafted in supersoft cotton, it's finished with raglan sleeves and dart details for a feminine touch. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cashmere boyfriend sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. Slightly oversize with a boxy silhouette and a flattering deep V-neck, you'll be glad this one's all yours. In a 12-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere henley
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. Combining the laid-back look of a henley with luxe cashmere, our designer finished it off with leather buttons for perfect polish. In a 12-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cropped city sweater
Product.Description: Our drapey and highly beltable cropped sweater features a feminine, face-framing shawl collar and oversize short sleeves. Fashioned from alpaca with a touch of fine-gauge merino for softness, it's the perfect piece for work or play. Acrylic/alpaca/merino wool in a 7-gauge knit. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Dream ribbed yoga cardigan
Product.Description: So soft, it practically named itself. Made with our beyond-soft dream yarn, it's the perfect layer to throw on when you want to chill with style. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 7-gauge knit. Long sleeves. Welt pockets. Hits below hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: September sweater
Product.Description: A soft and chic layering essential that's rich in color, thanks to a new heathered yarn spun with dark and light strands for depth and dimension. Short sleeves and a V-neck balance the boxy silhouette for a fresh play on proportion that we love. Acrylic/nylon/mohair/wool/viscose in a 5-gauge knit. Hits below hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere shawl-collar poncho
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. With short sleeves and a chic, boxy silhouette, this easy-to-wear, incredibly cozy poncho is the perfect luxe layering piece. In a 12-gauge knit. Shawl collar. Kangaroo pocket. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Hadley sweater
Product.Description: The classic merino crewneck, detailed with military-inspired epaulets and leather buttons for a touch of tough-chic style. In a 7-gauge knit. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Hadley sweater in stripe
Product.Description: Our classic crewneck sweater earns its stripes in a chunky knit accented with military-inspired detailing, like epaulets and leather buttons for a touch of tough-chic style. Merino wool in a 7-gauge knit. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Pouch-pocket cardigan
Product.Description: Our classic needle-rib cardigan gets even better with oversize buttons and chic pouch pockets. Crafted from lightweight Pima cotton with a hint of wool in the prettiest neutral palette, it's the perfect lightweight layer you'll wear again and again. In a 14-gauge knit. V-neck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Shimmermist sweater
Product.Description: A shining example of style and simplicity. Our designer used a special shimmering metallic yarn to create this sweater's luminous texture. Viscose/poly in a 3-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Seacomb sweater
Product.Description: With a refreshing natural texture, a flattering-on-everyone silhouette and meticulous details like a rolled neck, exposed raglan linking and side slits, this sweater is among our favorites of the season. We're wearing ours over a cami and shorts for hands down the easiest elegance upgrade.Linen/viscose. Loose fit. Scoopneck. Elbow sleeves. Hits below hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Blanket poncho
Product.Description: Make an entrance in this stunning leather-trimmed poncho. Just throw it on and go it's the perfect third piece in place of a jacket. Wool/mohair/nylon in a 9-gauge knit. Oversize fit. Hits below hip. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Eden cardigan
Product.Description: A wear-with-all layer you'll live in for seasons to come. Its flattering slim fit and longer length make it perfect with practically everything. Merino wool in a 14-gauge knit. V-neck. Long sleeves. Patch pockets. Hits below hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Loophole cardigan
Product.Description: An easy, toss-on-and-go layer with a single button-and-loop closure, this cardigan is a master of minimalism. We love the longer length so chic with shorts and platform sandals. Linen/cotton. Loose fit. V-neck. Elbow sleeves. Hits below hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Zip-cable sweater
Product.Description: Our beloved cotton cable crewneck, detailed with a gold zipper at the shoulder and a slightly shrunken silhouette. Crafted in soft and cozy cotton you can wear all season long. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Shrunken fisherman sweater
Product.Description: We brought back our four-season classic the cable-knit crewneck sweater now fashioned in a perfectly chunky cotton knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Metallic slouch sweater
Product.Description: A top that is sure to turn heads thanks to its beautifully bronzed open weave and its elegant fit. Crafted from a luxurious Italian yarn. Viscose/poly. Loose fit. Open crewneck. Elbow sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Tippi sweater
Product.Description: The sweater you'll wear with everything our classically styled crewneck sweater spun in soft merino wool. In a 14-gauge knit. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Summerlong sweater
Product.Description: Linen on one side, cotton on the other the play between textures and tones gives this pullover unique dimension. Linen and cotton. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Featherweight cashmere long cardigan
Product.Description: Our designers gave this luxurious cardigan military-style pockets and an extra-long length so it's especially chic over shorts and skirts. But don't stop there it's also perfect with jeans and dresses. In a 14-gauge knit and spun from supersoft, luxurious Italian cashmere from a world-famous mill in the foothills of Piedmont. V-neck. Long sleeves. Flap welt pockets. Hits below hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Featherweight cotton cardigan
Product.Description: Color-happy cotton in a flattering-on-everyone shape our perfect summer cardigan is back, now with tortoise buttons. From the office to the beach and everywhere in between, our essential layer steals the scene. V-neck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Cashmere Isabel sweatshirt
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. In a 12-gauge knit. Open crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Captain cardigan
Product.Description: At-ease military style crafted in a slub yarn rich with tonality. With polished gold buttons and slouchy-chic tab sleeves. Cotton/rayon. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Lady lace popover
Product.Description: For this luxurious riff on the sweatshirt, our designers replicated the look of intricate lace in a fine merino yarn and layered it over chiffon. In a 14-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Hand wash.

Product.Name: Waffled cashmere zip sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. This luxe waffle knit style features extra-long ribbed cuffs and edgy zippers at the neck. Italian cashmere in a 12-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Dream turtleneck sweater
Product.Description: Spun from a lofty 12-gauge knit, this classic looks and fits like a dream. The high rib trim on the sleeves adds a flattering touch. Made from our special dream yarn a supersoft cashmere blend that feels just heavenly. Wool/nylon/cashmere. Turtleneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Dream Alexie sweater
Product.Description: Chunky horn shoulder buttons make this everyday basic feel signature yet still completely versatile and easy to wear. Spun from our beyond soft dream yarn. Wool/nylon/cashmere in a 7-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere V-neck sweater
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. In a 12-gauge knit. V-neck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Jackie cardigan
Product.Description: Our own style icon wear it alone or pair it with the matching shell as a classic twinset. It's better than ever in cotton blended with stretch in a superfine 14-gauge knit. Now available in a rainbow of happy hues. Cotton/nylon/spandex. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Perfect-fit mixed-tape cardigan
Product.Description: The easiest, most flattering cotton cardigan you'll own. It's made with our super-refined baby-rib cotton and is cut a bit slimmer, so the fit is fantastic. Our designers added welt pockets and grosgrain tape along the pockets and placket for a contrast of textures. V-neck. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Featherweight cashmere cardigan
Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. In a 14-gauge knit. Crewneck. Three-quarter sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Description: What makes our Italian cashmere so special? Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. In a 12-gauge knit. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cashmere turtleneck sweater

Not only do we insist on using the best yarn out there, but each season we develop completely custom colors that you'll only find at J.Crew. Every piece is carefully designed to become a forever favorite. Fitted. Turtleneck. Long sleeves. Hits at hip. Import. Dry clean.
